StringTable.Label: SurveyModule_Dec
StringTable.String: K-101 Survey Module System for "safely" investigating anomalies.

StringTable.Label: StartingSurveyModule_Dec
StringTable.String: KX-101 Experimental Survey System. Probably won't explode.

StringTable.Label: CommandShipModule_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=LeaderStat_Diligence_Icon] Increased [HS=HS_HitPoints]Hit Points[/HS] based on the Commander's [HS=HS_Diligence]Diligence[/HS]. [ICON=LeaderStat_Resolve_Icon] Increased Attack based on the Commander's [HS=HS_Resolve]Resolve[/HS].

StringTable.Label: CommandShipModule_Arcean_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=LeaderStat_Diligence_Icon] Increased [HS=HS_HitPoints]Hit Points[/HS] based on the Commander's [HS=HS_Diligence]Diligence[/HS]. [ICON=LeaderStat_Resolve_Icon] Increased Attack based on the Commander's [HS=HS_Resolve]Resolve[/HS].

StringTable.Label: CommandShipModule_Resistance_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=LeaderStat_Diligence_Icon] Increased [HS=HS_HitPoints]Hit Points[/HS] based on the Commander's [HS=HS_Diligence]Diligence[/HS]. [ICON=LeaderStat_Resolve_Icon] Increased Attack based on the Commander's [HS=HS_Resolve]Resolve[/HS]. [ICON=Stat_Special_Icon] +100% Experience.

StringTable.Label: Lasers_Dec
StringTable.String:
Westinghouse OTO Nimbus Laser Array.
[HS=HS_BeamWeapon]Beam weapons[/HS] provide moderate damage at a reasonable manufacturing cost.

StringTable.Label: ParticleBeam_Dec
StringTable.String: Westinghouse M103 Melera Light Gravitic Fusion Pulse cannon. Raises Fleet Beam Range by 4% Reduces Fleet Beam Attack by 2% Reduces Fleet Beam Accuracy by 2% [HS=HS_BeamWeapon]Beam weapons[/HS] provide moderate damage at a reasonable manufacturing cost.

StringTable.Label: Component_ExperimentalLaser_Dec
StringTable.String: An experimental laser system. Reduces Enemy Fleet's shieldefficiency by 4% Reduces Fleet Beam Accuracy by 3% [HS=HS_BeamWeapon]Beam weapons[/HS] provide moderate damage at a reasonable manufacturing cost.

StringTable.Label: Component_ExperimentalLaserX_Dec
StringTable.String: A very experimental laser system. Reduces Enemy Fleet's shieldefficiency by 8% Reduces Fleet Beam Accuracy by 6% [HS=HS_BeamWeapon]Beam weapons[/HS] provide moderate damage at a reasonable manufacturing cost.

StringTable.Label: Disrupters_Dec
StringTable.String: Walther X-2 Matter Disruptor System. Increases Fleet's Accuracy by 3% Reduces Own Fleet's beamattack by 3% [HS=HS_BeamWeapon]Beam weapons[/HS] provide moderate damage at a reasonable manufacturing cost.

StringTable.Label: Plasma_Dec
StringTable.String: Westinghouse M2000 Plasma Pod. Increases Fleet Beam Damage by 6% Reduces Fleet Beam Range by 3% Reduces Fleet Beam Accuracy by 3% [HS=HS_BeamWeapon]Beam weapons[/HS] provide moderate damage at a reasonable manufacturing cost.

StringTable.Label: ParticleBeamX_Dec
StringTable.String: Westinghouse M105 Melera Light Gravitic Fusion Pulse cannon. Increases Fleet Beam Range by 8% Reduces Fleet Beam Attack by 4% Reduces Fleet Beam Accuracy by 4% [HS=HS_BeamWeapon]Beam weapons[/HS] provide moderate damage at a reasonable manufacturing cost.

StringTable.Label: DisruptersX_Dec
StringTable.String: Walther X-3 Matter Disruptor System. Increases Fleet Beam Accuracy by 6% Reduces Fleet Beam Damage by 6% [HS=HS_BeamWeapon]Beam weapons[/HS] provide moderate damage at a reasonable manufacturing cost.

StringTable.Label: DisruptersXe_Dec
StringTable.String: Walther X-3a Matter Disruptor System. Increases Fleet Beam Accuracy by 12% Reduces Fleet Beam Damage by 9% [HS=HS_BeamWeapon]Beam weapons[/HS] provide moderate damage at a reasonable manufacturing cost.

StringTable.Label: PlasmaX_Dec
StringTable.String: Westinghouse M2000A Omni Plasma Pod. Increases Fleet Beam Damage by 9% Reduces Fleet Beam Range by 6% Reduces Fleet Beam Accuracy by 3% Using 120 Terawatts of power, this plasma based weapon system provides moderate damage at a reasonable manufacturing cost.

StringTable.Label: PlasmaXe_Dec
StringTable.String: Westinghouse M2000A-X Omni Plasma Pod. Increases Fleet Beam Damage by 12% Reduces Fleet Beam Range by 9% Using 130 Terawatts of power, this plasma based weapon system provides moderate damage at a reasonable manufacturing cost.

StringTable.Label: PhasedCannons_Dec
StringTable.String:
Westinghouse M3KA1 Phased energy weapon system.
Delivering 175 Terawatts of power this phased energy weapon system, like all beam weapon systems, provides moderate damage at a reasonable manufacturing cost.

StringTable.Label: DoomRay_Dec
StringTable.String:
Westinghouse MX-Z1 Phased "Doom" ray.
How this weapon system works is top secret. Even for you.

StringTable.Label: Missile_HypersonicMissile_Dec
StringTable.String:
Banthar M1 Space Missile.
[HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile weapons[/HS] are slightly weaker in battle but can be used to attack enemy fleets at range.

StringTable.Label: Stinger_Dec
StringTable.String:
Enables short range missile attack.
[HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile weapons[/HS] are slightly weaker in battle but can be used to attack enemy fleets at range.

StringTable.Label: Component_ExperimentalMissile_Dec
StringTable.String: Enables medium range missile attack. Decreases Enemy Fleet Missile Defense by 4% Reduces Fleet Missile Accuracy by2% Reduces Fleet Hitpoints by 3% [HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile weapons[/HS] are slightly weaker in battle but can be used to attack enemy fleets at range.

StringTable.Label: Component_ExperimentalMissileX_Dec
StringTable.String:
Enables medium range missile attack.
Decreases Enemy Fleet Missile Defense by 8% Reduces Fleet Missile Accuracy by4% Reduces Fleet Hitpoints by 6% [HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile weapons[/HS] are slightly weaker in battle but can be used to attack enemy fleets at range.

StringTable.Label: Harpoon_Dec
StringTable.String:
Raytheox M-4 "Avenger" missile. Increases Fleet Missile AOE Range by 15%
Delivers a nuclear payload. [HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile weapons[/HS] are slightly weaker in battle but can be used to attack enemy fleets at range.

StringTable.Label: Phoenix_Dec
StringTable.String: Sandrala "Phoenix" Medium Missile Increases Fleet Missile Damage by 4% Reduces Fleet Missile Accuracy by 2% The Sandrala uses a fusion based nuclear reaction to do substantial damage.

StringTable.Label: PhotonicWarhead_Dec
StringTable.String: Melera Heavy "Photonic" warhead. Reduces enemy Fleet Beam Accuracy by 4% The Melera delivers a devastating fusion reaction to the enemy.

StringTable.Label: HarpoonX_Dec
StringTable.String:
Raytheox M-4X "Harpoon" missile. Enables short range missile attack. Increases Fleet Missile AOE Range by 30%
Delivers an antimatter payload. [HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile weapons[/HS] are slightly weaker in battle but can be used to attack enemy fleets at range.

StringTable.Label: PhoenixX_Dec
StringTable.String: Raytheonix "Matadrox" Medium Missile. Increases Fleet Missile Damage by 8% Reduces Fleet Missile Accuracy by 4% Delivers an antimatter based warhead. [HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile weapons[/HS] are slightly weaker in battle but can be used to attack enemy fleets at range.

StringTable.Label: PhotonicWarheadX_Dec
StringTable.String: Enhanced Melera "Photonic" warhead. Reduces enemy Fleet Beam Accuracy by 8% The Enhanced Melera adds a fragment of antimatter to intensify the reaction.

StringTable.Label: TritonTorpedoes_Dec
StringTable.String: GH-32 "Triton" Stellar Torpedo requires antimatter for its massive destructive capability. Reduces Enemy Fleet's Kinetic Accuracy by 4%

StringTable.Label: NightmareTorpedoes_Dec
StringTable.String: Raytheonix Mk 76 "Nightmare" Stellar Torpedo creates temporary weaknesses in the fabric of space-time to deliver massive damage to the enemy. Reduces Enemy Fleet's Kinetic Accuracy by 8%

StringTable.Label: Cannon_Dec
StringTable.String:
Arsenal Mk III "Star" cannon.
[HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS] combine high damage with a high Manufacturing cost.

StringTable.Label: PulseCannon_Dec
StringTable.String: Arsenal Mk V Space railgun. Increases Fleet's Kinetic Damage by 2% Reduces Fleet's Kinetic Accuracy by 2% Reduces Fleet's Kinetic Range by 2% [HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS] combine high damage with a high Manufacturing cost.

StringTable.Label: Component_ExperimentalKinetic_Dec
StringTable.String: [HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS] combine high damage with a high Manufacturing cost. Reduces Enemy Fleet's Kinetic Armor Efficiency by 4% Reduces Fleet's Kinetic Accuracy by 2%

StringTable.Label: Component_ExperimentalKineticX_Dec
StringTable.String: [HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS] combine high damage with a high Manufacturing cost. Reduces Enemy Fleet's Kinetic Armor Efficiency by 8% Reduces Fleet's Kinetic Accuracy by 4%

StringTable.Label: MassDriver_Dec
StringTable.String: General Destruction Pulse Cannon Mk I. Increases Fleet's Kinetic Accuracy by 4% Decreases Fleet's Kinetic Range by 2% [HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS] combine high damage with a high Manufacturing cost.

StringTable.Label: VulcanicDriver_Dec
StringTable.String: Copeland Industries Graviton "Gun" uses exotic materials to deliver a high rate of fire to decimate enemy hulls. Increases Fleet's Kinetic Range by 5% Decreases Fleet's Kinetic Accuracy by 2% [HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS] combine high damage with a high Manufacturing cost.

StringTable.Label: PulseCannonX_Dec
StringTable.String: The General Destruction Mk I Railgun integrates a fragment of Thulium to greatly increase the density of the projectile. Increases Fleet's Kinetic Damage by 4% Reduces Fleet's Kinetic Accuracy by 4% Reduces Fleet's Kinetic Range by 4% [HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS] combine high damage with a high Manufacturing cost.

StringTable.Label: MassDriverX_Dec
StringTable.String: General Destruction "Shredder" Pulse Cannon. Uses Thulium to increase projectile density. Increqse Fleet's Kinetic Accuracy by 6% Decreases Fleet's Kinetic Range By 4% [HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS] combine high damage with a high Manufacturing cost.

StringTable.Label: VulcanicDriverX_Dec
StringTable.String: Copeland Industries Enhanced "Vulcan" gun makes use of Thulium to deliver more mass to the target without increasing the side of the ordinance. Increases Fleet's Kinetic Range by 10% Decreases Fleet's Kinetic Accuracy by 4% [HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS] combine high damage with a high Manufacturing cost.

StringTable.Label: QuantumDriver_Dec
StringTable.String: Meridoc "Quantum" Driver Mk-I. Originally used to shatter subspace stream focal points, the Quantum driver makes a very potent weapon system. Increases Fleet's Kinetic Range by 15% Decreases Fleet's Kinetic Accuracy by 6% [HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS] combine high damage with a high Manufacturing cost.

StringTable.Label: SingularityDriver_Dec
StringTable.String: Meridoc Blackhole Projector. Increases Fleet's Kinetic Range by 20% Decreases Fleet's Kinetic Accuracy by 8% Fires a singularity fragment (a tiny blackhole) at the enemy. Contact results in massive damage.

StringTable.Label: AdvPointDefense_Dec
StringTable.String: Increases Point Defenses with Antimatter detection

StringTable.Label: AdvECM_Dec
StringTable.String: Increases Point Defenses with Antimatter detection

StringTable.Label: ConstructorModule_Dec
StringTable.String: Allows a ship to build a starbase.

StringTable.Label: ConstructorModuleAuto_Dec
StringTable.String: Allows a ship to build a starbase.

StringTable.Label: CargoModule_Dec
StringTable.String: Allows a ship to create a trade route.

StringTable.Label: SupplyModule_Dec
StringTable.String: Allows a ship to transport Manufacturing to another world.

StringTable.Label: SupplyModule_Prolific_Dec
StringTable.String: Allows a ship to transport Manufacturing to another world.

StringTable.Label: TransportModule_Dec
StringTable.String: Allows a ship to Invade planets.

StringTable.Label: AdvancedTransportModule_Dec
StringTable.String: Allows a ship to Invade Planets, and carries 2 Interceptor Drones.

StringTable.Label: AssaultCarrierModule_Dec
StringTable.String: Carries 9 Fast and deadly Assault Fighters

StringTable.Label: ReinforcedHullX_Dec
StringTable.String: Extremely expensive hull enhancement when cost is not a concern.

StringTable.Label: DivineTempleSupportModule_Dec
StringTable.String: Greatly boost all types of defense, on all ships in a fleet.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorProtectionField_Dec
StringTable.String: Greatly boost all types of defense, on all ships in a fleet.

StringTable.Label: ZalonDefenseSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: Reduces the defense of all enemy ships in combat

StringTable.Label: Component_Faction1_Dec
StringTable.String: This ship is unique to our faction

StringTable.Label: Component_Prototype_Dec
StringTable.String: Prototypes are unique, once they are destroyed they are gone forever.

StringTable.Label: Component_AntimatterBomb_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Special_Icon] Antimatter Bomb damages enemy fleets within a 1 tile radius.

StringTable.Label: Component_RepairDrones_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Special_Icon] Drones can be sent to repair any nearby fleet.

StringTable.Label: Component_WeaponRange_Dec
StringTable.String: Increases the weapon range of the ship.

StringTable.Label: Component_SpawnLoireagClone_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Special_Icon] Can Spawn a clone of itself

StringTable.Label: Component_CrimeAOE_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=CrimeIcon32] +10% [HS=HS_Crime]Crime[/HS] to Neutral and Enemy worlds in range

StringTable.Label: Component_CrimeAOEPerLevel_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=CrimeIcon32] +5% [HS=HS_Crime]Crime[/HS] per Level to Neutral and Enemy worlds in range

StringTable.Label: Component_InfluencePerLevel_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=InfluenceGrowth_Icon] +5% [HS=HS_Influence]Influence[/HS] per Level to worlds in range

StringTable.Label: Component_Income20_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Credits_Net_Icon] +20% [HS=HS_ColonyGrossIncome]Income[/HS] to the planet this ship is orbiting

StringTable.Label: Component_Manufacturing20_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Manufacturing_Icon] +20% [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] to worlds in this ship's radius

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_HitPointsCap_Dec
StringTable.String: Our ship's most valuable asset is a dedicated crew that is prepared for any emergency.

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_Moves_Dec
StringTable.String: By improving the tools at our helm we can make our ship more effective and efficient.

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_SensorRange_Dec
StringTable.String: A greater range of sensor equipment will allow us to discover more of the galaxy's wonder, and avoid its threats.

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_BeamUpgrade_Dec
StringTable.String: We can increase the power of our lasers by powering them with elerium.

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_MissileUpgrade_Dec
StringTable.String: Even small samples of antimatter can improve the detonation of our warheads.

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_KineticUpgrade_Dec
StringTable.String: Titanium and aluminium alloys are quickly shredded by durantium composite munitions.

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_AIController_Dec
StringTable.String: Allowing the AI to run our critical systems leaves us less to manage.

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_VirtualBridge_Dec
StringTable.String: By replaying battles our crew can learn more from our victories.

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_Cantena_Dec
StringTable.String: A place for our crew to relax, unwind and establish the bonds that will aid them in battle.

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_ImmuneNebula_Dec
StringTable.String: Makes all ships in fleet immune to damaging Nebula Effects.

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_DroneCarrier_Dec
StringTable.String: Carries 2 small but nasty Interceptor Drones.

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_FleetShields_Dec
StringTable.String: Generates a basic Shield system for all ships in fleet

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_FleetShieldsTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Generates a basic Shield system for all ships in fleet

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_FleetPointDefense_Dec
StringTable.String: Generates a basic Point Defense system for all ships in fleet

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_FleetPointDefenseTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Generates a basic Point Defense system for all ships in fleet

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_FleetArmor_Dec
StringTable.String: Generates a basic Armor system for all ships in fleet

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_FleetArmorTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Generates a basic Armor system for all ships in fleet

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_WeaponRange_Dec
StringTable.String: Increase the range of the ship's weapons.

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_WeaponCooldown_Dec
StringTable.String: Increases the rate of fire of the ship's weapons.

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_Jamming_Dec
StringTable.String: Makes the ship much harder to target in battle.

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_EnemyShields_Dec
StringTable.String: Reduces Shield strength of the enemy fleet by 50%.

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_EnemyShieldsTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Reduces Shield strength of the enemy fleet by 50%.

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_EnemyPointDefense_Dec
StringTable.String: Reduces the Point Defense of the enemy fleet by 50%

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_EnemyPointDefenseTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Reduces the Point Defense of the enemy fleet by 50%

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_EnemyArmor_Dec
StringTable.String: Reduces the Armor of the enemy fleet by 50%

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_EnemyArmorTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Reduces the Armor of the enemy fleet by 50%

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_FleetAttack_Dec
StringTable.String: Increases the attack of all ships in fleet.

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_ShipBeamAttack_Dec
StringTable.String: Increases the damage done by all [HS=HS_BeamWeapon]Beam[/HS] weapons in the fleet.

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_ShipMissileAttack_Dec
StringTable.String: Increases the damage done by all [HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile[/HS] weapons in the fleet.

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_ShipKineticAttack_Dec
StringTable.String: Ship upgrade that increases damage done by all [HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic[/HS] weapons in the fleet.

StringTable.Label: Component_AttackZOC50_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=BeamAttackIcon] +50% [HS=HS_BeamWeapon]Beam[/HS] Attack when inside borders [ICON=KineticAttackIcon] +50% [HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic[/HS] Attack when inside borders [ICON=MissileAttackIcon] +50% [HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile[/HS] Attack when inside borders

StringTable.Label: Component_FleetDefense4_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=ShieldStrengthIcon] +4 Fleet Shield strength [ICON=PointDefenseIcon] +4 Fleet Point Defense [ICON=ArmorRateingIcon] +4 Fleet Armor
